title: STRONG HYPNOTIC ECSTASY WITH NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
Dr. Paret has developed various techniques to induce hypnotic states non-verbally. Here his students are practicing the powerful techniques, that they learned in his masterclass. In the forests of Brazil, the subject can experience a hypnotic ecstasy, connecting to nature. The whites of the eyes showed a deep hypnotic state and waking up she felt the positive change with a big smile on her face. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
